title: MyAxisPoint
description: The Restaurant, Bar, or Quick Service Restaurant (QSR) business isn't what it used to be. With a wave of breaches that have eroded consumer trust combined with an aging technology set, the industry is quickly mobilizing towards forward thinking ahead of the curve. MyAxisPoint is a patented next generation Point of Sale, Gift Card, Rewards, and Loyalty system for businesses who want a technology partner that looks out for their business, while delivering technology and services that enable their business to reach new operational heights.
